name: International Board of Business Owners & Entrepreneurs
goal:
Entreps is the International Board of Business Owners and Entrepreneurs. Entreps is a Brussels-based AISBL and a non-profitable, non-political, non-religious international organization based present in 126 countries (what means 126 counsels carrying our activities free) who promotes and backs up the shared interests of: SMEs, Entrepreneurs, Innovative and Techy Actors, International Traders, StartUps, Autonomous Workers, Investors and Institutions who either run or enhance sustainable business activities: https://www.google.com/url?sa=t&source=web&rct=j&url=https://www.youtube.com/watch%3Fv%3D1jQ6K7EIldw&ved=2ahUKEwjjruyojo3lAhVNLVAKHQUDDAYQwqsBMAF6BAgLEAg&usg=AOvVaw3rCV3KYE2je1XXbIrY4xDe

Entreps was born in Boston MA, US in 2010 and gathers together 2,2 million organizations and people in the 5 continents; its activities are mainly related to business developing and to institutional affairs.
So far Entreps, the organization, has worked hand in hand with the UN, the European Commission (DG Grow, DG Employment and others DGs), the EESC of the EU, the Committee of the Regions of the EU, the US Government, some Latinamerica's and Asia's and Africa's powers and many other business doers such as EuroChambres, Best Franchisee of the World, LinkedIn, INDITEX-Zara, the EUROPEO CÃ­rcular Economy Package, the President of the European Parliament 2014-19, InterNations... and public figures.
Among our projects you can count on the "European Entreps DNA", the "ByLeaders, World GeoCommunity", the "Entreps Non-Borders Business Passport" for Business Doers, the "1st Year of No-Taxation" for Entrepreneurs and StartUps and SMEs, and the "Global Entreps Awards" who gathers together every year around 5,000 representatives and business doers from all over the world. Please take a look at this examples:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1QTWqBs4700

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N7Dlcjm9zdk

Entreps has presented awards to organizations and people and companies in its anual galas, and supports organizations like GYLF (Global Youth Leadership Forum), Young Entrepreneurs of the EU, African SMEs, International Franchisers...
These are some videos with the winners:

Winners, DG Grow and the CEO of EuroChambres: https://youtu.be/XWTDasYOfGg

Winner President of the Committee of the Regions of Europe: https://youtu.be/A7M6niCLkqI

Winner, Serial Entrepreneur who overcame many "stones in her life" and author of the book "No Excuses": https://youtu.be/-RY_9mxvDWk

Winner, President of the European Social and Economic Committee: https://youtu.be/rMUs8LtABy4

Winner, President of the US 5,000-Regional-Development-Agencies: https://youtu.be/yb8TuILMA-Q

Entreps plays an active role in the EUWRC, European Week of Regions and Cities:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f90dpUHzJ-E

And coorganizes many events and meetings with the collaboration of www.InterNations.org holding a Consul Position in this organization in order to promote business nertworking among more than 120 nationalities.

Entreps believes and promotes Nature and Honesty above other principles and as our gesture stands, with our hand over our forehead, we are always: "Looking Forward for a Better Future".

Contact us via:

Protocol@entreps.org

Thank you.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, Fraud prevention, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
